items.description: List of all return requests related to an order.

returnRequestId.description: The ID of the return request.

returnLabel.description: Return label of the return request

isExchangeRequest.description: Either it is exchange / return request.

returnItems.description: List of return items in the return request.

quantityToReturn.description: The quantity Returned of the return item.

productId.description: The Product ID of the return item.

returnReason.description: The return reason of the return item.

additionalProperties.description: Additional properties returned by return request validation webhook

state.description: The state of the return item.

catRefId.description: The SKU ID of the return item.

createdDate.description: The authorization date of the return request.

totalRefund.description: The total refund amount of the return request.

additionalProperties.description: Additional properties returned by return request validation webhook

totalReturnQuantity.description: The total returned quantity in the return request.

operation.description: The return operation of the return request
